name: KrackOut - Darktober Jam 2018 (Breakout Clone)
description:
Breakout-Clone with 5 levels, each level has several dynamic backgrounds. Use your mouse to control the bat. Destroy all bricks to rich the next level.

This Game was made for the DarkTober Jam 2018.

 Version 1.0.0 - Release

Features: - 5 Levels - Level-Gallery - Bonus Bricks like Laser-Bat, Big-Bat and more ...

Difficult: easy
Genre: Casual
Engine: Game Maker Studio

Main-Theme composed by: Alexander Hilliger

Coding & Rendering: Hilliger Media

Please report bugs and suggestions to the comments.
